title: Help!
body:
On August 23 I played league like I always do today on August 24 after this new patch my league clinet wont download the patch. No matter what it keeps telling me to retry. I already have redownloaded league twice. plz help!
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

replies.body:
Patching issues can be caused by a few different factors, such as League not running with administrative permissions or there being a disconnect between you and the patching service. Our [Patching Issues guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues) consolidates the most frequent fixes, though, and is a great place to start.

Let me know if this helped you resolve the issue.
